title: Tennis: List of US Open men's singles champions

maintext:
List of U.S. Open men's singles champions since the tournament began in 1881:

2018 - Djokovic beat Juan Martin del Potro (Argentina) 6-3 7-6(4) 6-3
2017 - Nadal beat Kevin Anderson (South Africa) 6-3 6-3 6-4
